name: Mad Blocker Alpha
description:
Fluzzle's are small fluffy creatures who love shape morphing in their beautiful homeland of machu popyu.
Alas, evil mokes are polluting their world in the name of profits and pointy charts that impress moke industry big wigs.
Help the Fluzzle's gather in groups of 4 or more matching coloured blocks to unleash the power of Buhmba against the mokes.
But beware should the mokes prove too powerful, the Fluzzle's will be trapped in block form forever as terrible desaturons.
Go forth and rejuvenate.
